name: Cake Or Real
description:
This game is made for brackeys game jam 2022.2. it is funny, goofy game with satisfying environment. in this game you have to guess if object on photo is cake or not.

Gameplay Screenshot:

Also Game is full with weird jokes. for example, when you make mistake, mr incredible becomes uncanny

Right now in development process terrible thing happened in the world, Russia invaded Ukraine. there is world crisis going and for supporting Ukrainian people, I put this in my game. 

Russia also invaded my country - Sakartvelo(Georgia )in 2008, that is why I tried to protest this cruel actions.

20% of my country is still occupied to this day by Russian forces and people are still living with consequences war.

Thanks All For Playing.
